results.content:
The lecturer is engaging and provides good explanations. However, 
#1. Course content is not complete. Last lecture cuts-off half way thru. 
#2. The course uses bootstrap version 3. The course could use an update to include some newer bootstrap 4 features.
#3 I faced some issues with the resulting web-page during the course even though I typed-in the same code as in the video lecture. I could have overcome this if the web assets used during the course were available as a download to compare our work and progress.
results.content_html:
The lecturer is engaging and provides good explanations. However,
#1. Course content is not complete. Last lecture cuts-off half way thru.
#2. The course uses bootstrap version 3. The course could use an update to include some newer bootstrap 4 features.
#3 I faced some issues with the resulting web-page during the course even though I typed-in the same code as in the video lecture. I could have overcome this if the web assets used during the course were available as a download to compare our work and progress.

results.content: The lectures were very understandable, especially the jquery where I find it hard to understand back then. Now I have better understanding how HTML, CSS, BootStrap, and Jquery works. I just wish the instructor talked more on how to make a website responsive. I understood that the meta tag plays part on it, but I'm not sure if its enough to make an entire webpage responsive. Overall it was a great learning and I'm satisfied?
results.content_html: The lectures were very understandable, especially the jquery where I find it hard to understand back then. Now I have better understanding how HTML, CSS, BootStrap, and Jquery works. I just wish the instructor talked more on how to make a website responsive. I understood that the meta tag plays part on it, but I'm not sure if its enough to make an entire webpage responsive. Overall it was a great learning and I'm satisfied?

results.content: The instructor's voice is quite clear. The topics are well explained. Most of the topics are covered in depth. The HTML5 section has everything you need to learn from basics to advanced, the CSS section wasn't that vast. It should have covered more topics rather than just basics. The Bootstrap section was good, could have been a little more vast.  In the jQuery section, many topics are covered. One thing that I found strange was he first write the script part sing all the ids and classes, then he writes the HTML part giving those classes and ids to div white is a very wrong practice, but overall the course is nice.
results.content_html: The instructor's voice is quite clear. The topics are well explained. Most of the topics are covered in depth. The HTML5 section has everything you need to learn from basics to advanced, the CSS section wasn't that vast. It should have covered more topics rather than just basics. The Bootstrap section was good, could have been a little more vast. In the jQuery section, many topics are covered. One thing that I found strange was he first write the script part sing all the ids and classes, then he writes the HTML part giving those classes and ids to div white is a very wrong practice, but overall the course is nice.

results.content: Very well put together and explained very well. I believe that ANYONE could easily follow along, and understand, this course regardless of prior HTML knowledge... I learned quite a LOT and I was able to learn it very easily. I had made several websites many years ago so this was a small help for me, however, that was using the old HTML and CSS. There were more changes than I had expected! I'm so glad that I took this course. Now I can create "up to date" websites with no problem!

results.content:
Another average HTML & CSS course. Material is very unengaging. Dummy text examples. Formatting is sloppy (OCD alert).
I took one star because the course doesn't teach responsive practices. No media queries or percentage units.
And I took another star because there is nothing HTML5 or CSS3 related. No <header>,<footer>, border-radius, transitions, :first-child etc.
And half a star because mastering HTML includes tables and forms which are not mentioned let alone covered. 
The way I see it this course is mashed up from other courses of the same tutor.
results.content_html:

And half a star because mastering HTML includes tables and forms which are not mentioned let alone covered.
The way I see it this course is mashed up from other courses of the same tutor.

results.content:
The instructor explained examples only superficially. He made a lot of mistakes in every video and coding style isn't the best (indent between lines - use a tab as the delimiter; empty lines). Sometimes a video does not respond to the question on this subject.

The author made a big job for us, but explain these subjects (HTML, CSS, JQuery, and Bootstrap) for 6 hours is impossible.

Thank you for the big job!
results.content_html:
The instructor explained examples only superficially. He made a lot of mistakes in every video and coding style isn't the best (indent between lines - use a tab as the delimiter; empty lines). Sometimes a video does not respond to the question on this subject.

The author made a big job for us, but explain these subjects (HTML, CSS, JQuery, and Bootstrap) for 6 hours is impossible.

Thank you for the big job!
